metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010006 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Evince 3.26.0 is affected by buffer overflow. The impact is: DOS / Possiblecode execution. The component is: backend/tiff/tiff-document.c. The attackvector is: Victim must open a crafted PDF file. The issue occurs because ofan incorrect integer overflow protection mechanism in tiff_document_renderand tiff_document_get_thumbnail.

criterions.comment: atril package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
